Package com.example.cmput301w24t33.events

Class EventRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.cmput301w24t33.events.EventRepository
public class EventRepository extends Object
Manages the retrieval and updates of Event data from Firebase Firestore. This repository is responsible for querying Firestore for event data, listening for real-time updates, and providing callbacks for successful data retrieval or errors.

    Interface defining callbacks for event data loading operations.

  • Method Details

    • setEventCallback

      public void setEventCallback(EventRepository.EventCallback eventCallback)
      Sets the callback to be used for event data operations.
      Parameters:
      eventCallback - The callback implementation to handle event data operations.

    • setEventsSnapshotListener

      public void setEventsSnapshotListener()
      Registers a listener for real-time updates to all events in the Firestore database. Notifies the set EventCallback on successful data retrieval or failure.

    • setEventByOrganizerSnapshotListener

      public void setEventByOrganizerSnapshotListener(String organizerId)
      Registers a listener for real-time updates to events organized by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      organizerId - The ID of the organizer to filter events by.

    • updateEvent

      public void updateEvent(Event event)
      Updates an existing event document in Firestore with new data from an Event object.
      Parameters:
      event - The event object containing updated information.

    • createEvent

      public void createEvent(Event event)
      Creates a new event document in Firestore and sets the document ID on the event object.
      Parameters:
      event - The new event to add to Firestore.
